title: Protesters Demand Police Officer Be Fired Over Pool Party Incident
teaser: Protesters called for a police officer to be fired as they marched through McKinney, Texas, Monday evening. The demonstration was peaceful and broke up after two hours. The marchers were angry that the officer pulled a gun briefly, and pushed a teenaged girl to the ground at a pool party on Friday evening.
